dcterms:creator: C. Ionescu
D. Papava
V. Olaru
C. Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: Human3.6M is the largest benchmark for 3D human pose estimation, containing 3.6 million video frames captured by a motion capture system in an indoor environment, where 11 professional actors perform 15 actions such as greeting, phoning, and sitting.
dcterms:title: Human3.6M

dcterms:creator: D. Mehta
H. Rhodin
D. Casas
P. Fua
O. Sotnychenko
W. Xu
C. Theobalt
dcterms:description: MPI-INF-3DHP is a large-scale 3D human pose dataset containing both indoor and outdoor scenes, with a test set consisting of three different scenes: studio with green screen, studio without green screen, and outdoor scene.
dcterms:title: MPI-INF-3DHP
